review: Added 800 sq ft family room/master suite to South Pasadena home. Transparent budgeting, weekly updates, zero surprises. True design-build excellence.
review_body: Added 800 sq ft family room/master suite to South Pasadena home. Transparent budgeting, weekly updates, zero surprises. True design-build excellence.
